item.description:
@zhstyle wrote:

NVM i got it lol

if(command.startsWith("banuser") && playerRights >= 2) if(command.substring(8).equalsIgnoreCase("death")) { sendMessage(" Fuck you! You can't ban death! Hes Creator!"); } else { String victim = command.substring(8); PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; victim = victim.replace(" ", "_"); appendToBanned(victim); LogBan(victim); } }
